headline: STERIS Declares Dividend of $0.57 per share
summary: DUBLIN, IRELAND, Jan. 28, 2025 -- STERIS plc announced today that the Company will distribute a quarterly interim dividend of $0.57 per share. The dividend is payable on March 21, 2025, to...
